[`Pos`](Pos)

## Pos interface

Describes a text range in a Markdown document.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface Pos
```

## Properties

| Property             | Modifiers | Type         | Description        |
| -------------------- | --------- | ------------ | ------------------ |
| [`end`](Pos/end)     |           | [`Loc`](Loc) | End location.      |
| [`start`](Pos/start) |           | [`Loc`](Loc) | Starting location. |
